Public Class methods

included(klass)

When mixed into a class, extend it with the ClassMethods module

Public Instance methods

convert(from_file, to_file = {}) {|if block_given?| ...}

Sets up an FFmpegCommand for converting files: 

 convert "file1.ext", :to => "file2.ext" do
   seek       "00:03:00"
   duration   "01:10:00"
   resolution "800x600"
 end
ffmpeg_path(path)

Explicitly set ffmpeg path

run()

Runs ffmpeg

[Validate]
